TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定義由環境實作的介面，該環境裝載工作流程設計工具和編譯器，以便在驗證和編譯處理程序期間，提供環境特定的編譯資訊。

span.span: Defines the interface implemented by the environment hosting the workflow designer and compiler to provide environment-specific compilation information during the validation and compilation processes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CheckTypes As Boolean
public: property bool CheckTypes { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值指出是否已選取型別。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether types are checked.

value.span: 如果型別已選取，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在工作流程編譯的驗證階段，工作流程來源文件遭拒如果屬性是`true`與工作流程或附屬規則檔案直接參考任何.NET Framework 型別不存在的清單授權的類型。During the validation phase of workflow compilation, a workflow source document is rejected if the property is `true` and the workflow or the companion rules file directly references any .NET Framework types not present on a list of authorized types. 已授權型清單是 XML 文件其中每個項目表示`Assembly`、 `Namespace`、 `TypeName`，和`Authorized`{`true`或`false`} 指標。The list of authorized types is an XML document where each entry indicates an `Assembly`, a `Namespace`, a `TypeName`, and an `Authorized` {`true` or `false`} indicator. 這個類別對應到清單上的項目。This class corresponds to an entry on the list. 亦請注意，也允許指定萬用字元，以包括或排除完整的命名空間。Also note that wildcard character designations are allowed, to include or exclude complete namespaces. 例如，使用`Type="System.*"`包括中的所有類型，包括子命名空間中所包含的類型。For example, using `Type="System.*"` includes all types in , including types contained in child namespaces. 已授權型清單的使用由選項 **/checktypes**或使用屬性。The use of a list of authorized types is controlled by the option **/checktypes** or by using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Language As String
public: property System::String ^ Language { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得當編譯工作流程時，環境所使用的程式設計語言，如 Visual Studio。

span.span: Gets the programming language used by the environment, such as Visual Studio, when compiling the workflow.

value.span: 開發環境所使用的程式設計語言名稱。

span.span: The name of the programming language used by the development environment.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範 `Language` 屬性的實作。The following example shows an implementation of the `Language` property. 這個範例來自＜追蹤設定檔設計工具 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Tracking Profile Designer 範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RootNamespace As String
public: property System::String ^ RootNamespace { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得專案的根命名空間組。

span.span: Gets the root namespace set for the project.
The name of the root namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用於 Visual Basic 編譯環境中，以傳遞專案的根命名空間至編譯器。This property is used in Visual Basic compilation environment to pass the root namespace of the project to the compiler. ## Examples 下列範例會示範 `RootNamespace` 屬性的實作。The following example shows an implementation of the `RootNamespace` property. 這個範例來自＜追蹤設定檔設計工具 SDK＞範例。This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Tracking Profile Designer 範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8)。For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8). [!code-csharp[Wf_samples#122](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#122)] [!code-vb[Wf_samples#122](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#122)]
